name: JP (@byjp@hachyderm.io)
summary:
Attached: 1 image

Is anyone aware of a #markup #language for #InteriorDesign?

I read this great article (https://luke.hsiao.dev/blog/housing-documentation/) on writing technical documentation for your house, and I'm building a #Hugo template for just this. I'd love to also document my home's room dimensions, where the outlets are, etc. so I can (a) make simple 3D models (b) create a clickable SVG (c) extract dimensions easily (for determining if new furniture/wallhangings will fit).
Any ideas? I'll probably end up bodging my own togetherâ€¦
